name: Hasan Demir
description: On one hand, Hasan is a clever and convincing man capable of bold moves. On the other, he fails to measure how is audacity may drive him to dangerous and even perilous situations. He has dedicated his life to Zetatech and feels he is not given enough retribution for his sacrifices. If V takes on the gigPrototype in the Scraper:When V meets Hasan, he reveals he is a runaway Zetatech engineer who ended up using a prototype eye implant on himself in order to escape and be able to sell it afterwards.Johnnyunderlines the irony of the situation in comparison to V's situation with theRelic.
